name: DCPU's
description:
Experience the cutting edge technology that is the new fronteir to mental health in robots.
Is your robot depressed? Constantly making snide remarks whilst you are travelling through hyperspace?
Well then you're in the right place!

Traverse through our super intelligent AI specimen's (John) hardware to cure him of his struggles - and you too can learn 
to help your companion live their best robotic life!

Our DCPU's (Depression-Curing Processing Units) will rewire any bugs left in your robot from the production team with a little bit
of your help.

It might be difficult once you're past the surface level hardware
But it'll be worth it in the end!




good luck
.

Controls:

A/D or Arrow Keys to move left and right. Dodge the RAM and try to get the DCPU in the socket without bending any pins to save John!

Credits:

gkapusta - Programming

BLANKdev - Art

--

This was our first game jam working together, and we only had about 5 hours to make it work. Given that we are very happy with it!!
